Class ValidationRules

java.lang.Object
  com.vtls.opensource.validation.ValidationRules
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidationHandler
public class ValidationRules
extends Object
implements ValidationHandler

This class handles a set of validation results using suitable validation rules and log the validation message information

validate

public boolean validate(Object _object,
                        String _name)
                 throws org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorException
Validate a field and return true if the field satisfies the validation rule

Parameters:
_object - a bean object
_name - a string of the name for the validated field
Returns:
true if the field satisfies the validation rule, otherwise false
Throws:
org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorException - if any error occurs during validation

handleValidatorResult

public boolean handleValidatorResult(org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorResources _resources,
                                     org.apache.commons.validator.ValidatorResult _result)
Go through a set of validation results processed on a JavaBean, log each validation result with the INFO Level, and log the alert message for failded validations

Specified by:
handleValidatorResult in interface ValidationHandler
Parameters:
_resources - a ValidatorResources configured through a validation.xml file
_result - a ValidatorResult contains a set of validation results
Returns:
true if the field satisfies the validation rule, otherwise false
